ygData.subject: Re: Has anyone dueled a magician?
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to let you all know, my RL best friend has a 36 Mage and I dueled him once for fun. You can imagine how pissed off I was when I lost exp after the fight.
ygData.messageBody:
Just to let you all know, my RL best friend has a 36 Mage and I dueled him
once for fun. You can imagine how pissed off I was when I lost exp after
the fight. Why? You ask.

Well, his pet killed me, causing me to die from a NPC, which also is the
same as dieing via a normal mob. The duel was void and I lost 1/2 bub exp
(this was back at level 29 or so, he was 31). So, I must stress, NEVER
fight a mage in a duel because if you die you can kiss goodbye to your exp
(if the pet gets the last hit and kills you).





Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...> on 04/01/2000
15:47:19

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: eqbards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Has anyone dueled a magician?




From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>

*sigh*

This teaches me to write an email just before I went to sleep. What I was
referring to was this person's inability to charm the Magician. Since he
was grouped with the magician he is unable to cast harmful effects like
charm on him.

Treilanin Loreweaver.

On Tue, 4 Jan 2000, Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:

> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> Actually the reason it did not stick is that a couple of months ago they
> patched charm so that you could not charm a pet while the summoner is
still
> alive.
>
> Rokenn
>
>
> >From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
> >Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >Subject: Re: [eqbards] Has anyone dueled a magician?
> >Date: Tue, 4 Jan 2000 00:15:28 -0500 (EST)
> >
> >Hey Beatdrop....
> >
> >The reason why your charm did not stick was the fact that you were still
> >grouped with the Magician. When grouped all spells and effects that are
> >harmful to your group members does not hit. I know for a fact that
charm
> >works. Heck I used it on my bride to be two patches after the PvP charm
> >patch and it worked without a problem. If this is not the case then my
> >bride will spank this poor bard when we duel this coming Saturday...
> >
> >Treilanin Loreweaver
> >
> >
> >On Mon, 3 Jan 2000, Beatdrop Battledrum wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Beatdrop Battledrum" <Beatdrop@...>
> > >
> > > Last night I was in a group in Highkeep and we got on the topic of
> >dueling. While I was running my mouth, the magician I was with
challenged
> >me to a duel. We were the same level (29) and I said what the hell. He
> >had a fire elemental pet that was blue to me so I decided that the only
way
> >I would stand a chance would be to try to charm him into fighting his
pet.
> >Well, let me just say that I thought charm was only nerfed on the PvP
> >servers and NOT in PvP mode. Wrong! So I start the duel with the
thought
> >of charming him. Hit the song, and wait, and wait, and wait... no
pulse!
> >WTF? So I try charming his pet that is now attacking me. Resist,
resist,
> >(thinking cool, its pulsing, gonna work), charm sticks but no charm!
> >Instead I got a message saying 'This NPC cannot be charmed.' Dammit!
NOOO!
> >Meanwhile, I am getting the hell nuked out of me while trying to figure
out
> >what to do next. So I die. I pop back up and my opponents health bar
is
> >down (still grouped) and I hear 'Beat, Demi is getting the sh*t kicked
out
> >of him.' Come to find out, after looting my corpse, that after I died,
his
> >pet agro'd on him. Strange charm bug is what I am assuming.
> > >
> > > Has anyone on the list dueled a magician or a caster with a pet and
won?
> > He was a really cool guy and I asked him for a rematch some other
time.
> >My new tactic is just like how I would fight a wizzie, below him to
death.
> >His pet wasn't hitting to hard and I think I can solo his pet by melee
and
> >songs. So, I think I can take him by just staying on his butt and
keeping
> >his spells interrupted.
> > >
> > > Any other suggestions? I am also assuming that Screech won't work
> >either.
> > >
> > > --
> > > ~Beatdrop Battledrum <Platinum Sphere>
> > > Child of Erollisi Marr
> > > Karana Server
> > > --
> > >
> > > > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> >lol@... with the subject submissions.
> > >
> >
